name: Cyborgcity
description:
HOW TO PLAY
  • JUMP THE OBSTACLES
  • COLLECT COINS
  • DODGE ENEMY BULLETS AND REMEMBER YOU HAVE AN ACTIVATE SHIELD

                                                                                  

                                                                 HISTORY we are in the year 2070 the astronauts are making a journey to an unknown planet but at a certain point the spacecraft falls as if there was something that attracts them, there were 4 astronauts from here only one survived, the survivor as soon as he understands what happened is in a world where it has the same characteristics as the earth but instead of human beings it finds cyborgs...have fun.....
